sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function HomePage() { const [webtoons, setWebtoons] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // Fetch webtoons from backend fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/webtoons') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setWebtoons(data)) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); }, []); return (
Adventure

After 30 days of travel across the world...

Watch Now

Fate / Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works

After 30 days of travel across the world...

Watch Now

Fate / Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works

After 30 days of travel across the world...

Watch Now
{/*

Top Webtoons

{webtoons.map((webtoon) => (

{webtoon.title}

{webtoon.description}

))}
*/}
); } export default HomePage;
